page.title: 12LIFE STYLE.
page.content: The villagers were mostly born and bred in the village and their families have lived there many years. Most of them find employment as domestic staff at Stonyhurst College. Their lives are centred in the village-the pub,the football club and the golf club. Many of the Stonyhurst teachers live in Stonyhurst property.They spend most of their social life with the other teachers.The men play sports together. They meet up at College functions.Most teachers leave the village during the holidays. Some commuters live in the area.Some commute as far as Manchester. The life styles of the priest and the public schoolboy are very different from others (see EDUCATION for the public schoolboy).
